alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 6:18PM EDT until July 30 at 4:45AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by overnight and early morning excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Floyd, Knott, Letcher and Pike. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 617 PM EDT, flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 3 and 6 inches has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hindman, Bath, Wheelwright, Fleming-Neon, Pippa Passes, Hall, Ivan, Greenleaf, Kite, Dry Creek, Omaha, Deane, Democrat, Halo, Drew, May, Topmost, Nealy, Hollybush and Lester.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
